00382         inline void setVertexLighting(const bool& a)
00383         {
00384                         if (a)
00385                         {
00386                                 glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00387                                 vertexlighting = true;
00388                         }
00389                         else
00390                         {
00391                                 glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00392                                 vertexlighting = false;
00393                         }
00394                 }
00395 
00397
